arm_group.description: Skin and mucosa insicion made together
Skin and mucosa incision made separately

brief_summary.textblock:
To compare the effect of two different surgical techniques, the dorsal slit and double
      incision technique, on postoperative pain.

clinical_study.brief_title: Two Different Surgical Techniques on Postoperative Circumcision Pain

detailed_description.textblock:
Two different circumcision techniques result in different kinds of pain.This research aims
      determine which is more beneficial to the patient.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Children

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with any bleeding

intervention.description: Skin and mucosa incision made together
Skin and mucosa incision made separately

facility.name: Diskapi Yildirim Beyazit Education and Research Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Two Different Circumcision Surgical Technique on Postoperative Pain

overall_official.affiliation: Yildirim Beyazit Education and Research Hospital

primary_outcome.measure: To asses postoperative  pain scores on Modified Objective Assessment Scale (MOAS)
